jd: From: Mohit Jaiswal, Intelligenz IT mohit.jaiswal@intelligenzit.com Reply to: mohit.jaiswal@intelligenzit.com Hi,I hope you and your family are doing well.I have a good position for you with my client. This point of time I don't know whether you are looking for a new job or not. But just thought if I can share the details and then confirm from you about your interest level for the opportunity. If you are interested and an available consultant, send me your most updated resumes in word format and contact details.Job Title: Mendix + Python DeveloperLocation: New York City-NY or Boston-MA (100% Onsite-Hybrid)Duration: Long term contractJob Description:Mendix, Python & SQL as primary sources of technology.Test driven development and source code reviews and change control standards to maintain compliance with policies.Strong technical ability, excellent communication and collaboration skills including the ability to develop and troubleshoot a diverse range of problems and influence stakeholders to get consensus on key decisions to ensure project deliveries are made under tight deadlines. Prefer at least 2-5 years of experience in financial services with basic understanding of Bonds, Loans, Mortgage backed securities.2-3 years of recent experience in Java or python and SQL.Prior experience in Mendix low code platform is required. Rapid Application Developer Mendix certification would be an added plus. AWS basic knowledge ( Cloud9 IDE, EC2, Lambda, Redshift, Aurora, Secret manager )Familiarity with React UI framework & skills to improve User Experience (UX) would also be an added plus. Regards,Mohit JaiswalIntelligenz ITWork : 646-502-7441
